benchmark_details.name: LogicPrpBank: A Corpus for Logical Implication and Equivalence
benchmark_details.overview: LOGIC PRPBANK contains 7093 Propositional Logic Statements (PLSs) across six mathematical subjects to study the reasoning capabilities of Language Models (LMs) regarding logical implication and equivalence.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate the reasoning of complex propositional logic in educational applications, particularly Intelligent Tutoring Systems (ITSs).
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The corpus may contain annotating errors and has limited coverage of propositional logic beyond mathematical fields.

data.source: Generated from ChatGPT API and validated by qualified human annotators.
data.annotation: Validated by qualified human annotators who corrected any inconsistencies in truth values.

methodology.calculation: F1 Scores calculated based on classifier performance on the test set.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 Scores indicate better performance in classifying the truth values of PLSs.
methodology.validation: Split into train (70%), validation (10%), and test (20%) sets; using three-seed runs.
